name: The Backrooms BR
description:
um grupo de estudantes do ifc(instituto federal catarinense)  vão para o caça e tiro(restaurante local) gravar uns takes e algo não parece estar certo___

(a group of students from ifc (federal institute of Santa Catarina) go to the hunting and shooting (local restaurant) to record some takes and something does not seem to be right___)

F para interagir com as portas

(F to interact with doors)
